FinAntes.name: FinAntes
FinAntes.description: A comprehensive financial management web application that centralizes budget tracking, spending analysis, and investment monitoring. Features interactive dashboard widgets, customizable budget categories, and data import/export capabilities with three service tiers for different user needs.

Konnect.name: Konnect
Konnect.description: Android application developed in Java and XML with a group. Led frontend development, assisted with backend development and debugging, resolved over 80% of the team's bugs and reduced API response time by 50%.

COVEY Discord Bot.name: COVEY Discord Bot
COVEY Discord Bot.description: Created a Discord bot enabling users to play minigames and assisting with moderation tasks. Used multiple JavaScript APIs to enhance user experience and taught a new developer to maintain the project.

TimePlanX Calendar Application.name: TimePlanX Calendar Application
TimePlanX Calendar Application.description: Designed a comprehensive calendar application in Java and XML, integrating features such as events, notes, and time blocks for streamlined user experience. Leveraged AI for method creation and design features.

AI Browser Web Extension.name: AI Browser Web Extension
AI Browser Web Extension.description: Developed a Chrome Web Extension for streamlined access to online AI platforms. Designed an intuitive user interface with one-click access to various AI tools across the web.

Portfolio.name: Portfolio
Portfolio.description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Built with React and modern web technologies to create a responsive and interactive user experience.

React App.name: React App
React App.description: A React application project demonstrating proficiency in modern frontend development techniques, component architecture, and state management.

CodeAcademy.name: CodeAcademy
CodeAcademy.description: Repository of projects and exercises completed during CodeAcademy courses, demonstrating mastery of various programming concepts and languages.

Interactive AI Storyteller.name: Interactive AI Storyteller
Interactive AI Storyteller.description: An interactive storytelling application powered by AI technology that creates dynamic and engaging narrative experiences based on user input.

GPT App.name: GPT App
GPT App.description: Application utilizing GPT models for various functionalities such as text generation, summarization, and conversation. Built with a focus on user experience and practical AI applications.

Leetcode.name: Leetcode
Leetcode.description: Collection of LeetCode problem solutions and practice, demonstrating algorithmic thinking, data structure knowledge, and problem-solving skills in various programming languages.
